snippet.title: Scorching Desert Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
You wake up alone in a mysterious desert & your task is finding out what happened! To do that you will build A base, craft better Tools & explore a vast desert landscape consisting of various unique biomes, that come with their own challenges & rewards!
On the Journey through the desert you will encounter many different threats
such as sandstorms, droughts & dangerous enemies, but as you'll find out there is something way darker & more sinister plagueing the desert!

Explore and surive in a vast 64^2km desert landscape composed of various unique and beautiful biomes, each with their own challenges! You might find yourself walking across the Sand Dunes or stopping and taking a good look at the beautiful scenery of a massive canyon.
Maybe you even find one of the old temples or long-forgotten cities of an ancient civilization.

The Remainig Question is:
Do you have what it takes to survive the Scorching Desert?

Wishlist us on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2625000/Scorching_Desert/

Support us Kickstarter:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1125440047/scorching-desert
